lexUnit.name: precise.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: marked by exactness and accuracy of expression or detail.

sentence.text: Developing better and more precise measurement of the properties of phenomena is the key to the progress of scientific knowledge .

He was never a precise golfer in the mould of Hogan , but his magnificent tactical management enabled him to calculate the exact odds in moments of high tension .
